vague_description: A company is seeking to optimize resource allocation for maximizing production while adhering to environmental and equipment constraints.
detailed_description: A mining company has available a total of \param{A} square miles of mining sites and considering the use of two mining techniques: heap leaching and vat leaching. For each square mile of land, heap leaching technique can have a daily production of \param{HeapProduction} tons of rare earth oxide per square miles but it also creates \param{HeapWaste} tons of polluted wastewater and requires \param{HeapMachines} extraction machines. On the other hand, vat leaching technique produces \param{VatProduction} tons of rare earth oxide per square miles per day while creating \param{VatWaste} tons of polluted wastewater and requiring \param{VatMachines} extraction machines. There are \param{MachinesAvailable} machines available and due to environmental regulations, the amount of polluted wastewater must be at most \param{WasteLimit} tons daily. Find the proportion of lands that use each mining technique in order to maximize the daily production of rare earth oxide.
target_objective: Maximize the daily production of rare earth oxide
target_constraints: Total land used for heap leaching and vat leaching must not exceed A square miles
Number of machines used for heap leaching plus those used for vat leaching must not exceed MachinesAvailable
Total wastewater produced by both leaching techniques must not exceed WasteLimit tons daily
The area allocated to heap leaching is non-negative
The area allocated to vat leaching is non-negative
target_parameters: Daily production of rare earth oxide per square mile using heap leaching technique
Daily production of polluted wastewater per square mile using heap leaching technique
Number of extraction machines required per square mile using heap leaching technique
Daily production of rare earth oxide per square mile using vat leaching technique
Daily production of polluted wastewater per square mile using vat leaching technique
Number of extraction machines required per square mile using vat leaching technique
Total number of extraction machines available
Maximum daily production of polluted wastewater allowed by environmental regulations
